org.springframework.cloud.aws.core.region

Class Ec2MetadataRegionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.aws.core.region.Ec2MetadataRegionProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RegionProvider

    public class Ec2MetadataRegionProvider
extends Object
implements RegionProvider
    RegionProvider implementation that dynamically retrieves the region with the EC2 meta-data. This implementation allows application to run against their region without any further configuration.
    Author:
    Agim Emruli, Gleb Schukin

        public com.amazonaws.regions.Region getRegion()
